name: Classopoly
description:
The Board Game:

In this parody of monopoly, class divide is taken to the extreme. "Class divide isn't always fair" is the backbone sentence of this project. Everything from the player that you chose to the age that you are plays a role to your success in the game much like it does in real life. Take a dive into the unfair world of CLASSOPOLY by choosing one of 6 player pieces who all start off with different amounts of money. Buy as many factories, offices and housing properties as you can to maximise profits. Make other players work for you while you make profit! The last one to not go broke WINS!

In the bellow zip folder are all the materials needed to play the game. Print them onto paper and your ready to go.
